content.question: An equation involves the expression <math alttext="log subscript 9 open parentheses 27 to the power of x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>9</mn></msub><mfenced><msup><mn>27</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, which is equivalent to a rational multiple of <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. By rewriting the expression in an equivalent form, the value of the rational number can be determined without use of a calculator or complicated calculations. Which of the following is an equivalent expression that satisfies this requirement?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="x ln open parentheses 27 over 9 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mn>27</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x log subscript 3 open parentheses 27 over 9 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mfenced><mfrac><mn>27</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator x ln 27 over denominator ln 9 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>ln</mi><mn>27</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator x log subscript 3 27 over denominator log subscript 3 9 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>27</mn></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator x log subscript 3 27 over denominator log subscript 3 9 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>27</mn></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
